---
name: Texture request
about: Select to proceed with a new texture being added to the Texturepack.
title: "[Request]"
labels: enhancement
assignees: Faye-one

---

Required:
- Path to file (a.e. \assets\minecraft\textures\painting)
- Name of the texture (a.e. diamond_sword)
- File of the texture (please make sure it is compatible)

Optional:
- Custom Name of re-textured item
